channel.title: Revival-RS 377 FULL REMAKE, NO BUGS, NO DUPES
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rKYFqyW.png[/img]
I AM AHRIDOK FROM R-S, enjoy the source ( I DO NOT GIVE PREMS TO RELEASE ANY OTHER PLACE, ONLY I WILL DO THAT!)
DOWNLOAD:
[url=http://www.upload.ee/files/3889581/Revival-RS.rar.html]http://www.upload.ee/files/3889581/Revival-RS.rar.html[/url] CLIENT: (Use 2006memorys client)
Decided to release this, have no time to work on it anymore, so enjoy!
CREDITS: 2006Scape Team,2006Memory Team, Revival-RS Team
FEATURES/FIXED BUGS/ADDED
Also features music system can be enabled, client with secure UID can be enabled, and all dupes have been fixed on this version! Global object one.
(There is so many more fixes/updates can't remember alot of them :p)
[CODE] 1# Added Lesser Demon to the Wizard tower near Draynor 2# Added Canifis City NPC's 3# Banana-harvesting (picking bananas from trees - Karamja) 4# Added mage bank shop (includes God capes, Staff's) 5# Added Oziach's Armour (includes rune platebody [YES FINALLY for you players], and green d'hide body) 6# All slayer shops have been fixed 7# Fixed too high price for green d'hides alch 8# Added Barker's Haberdashery Shop 9# Mithril seeds has been added 10# Siegfried Erkle Shop has been added to Legends guild (2 floor correct location) 11# Few clue scrolls fixed 1# Fixed Kolodian shop (Not opening) 2# Added Monkeys to Karamja 3# Scavvo's Rune Store has been added to Champions guild 4# Added Dragon SQ making from the left+right side's 5# Added loads of new Clue NPC's from help of "Mushroom"! 6# Stability and bug fixes 1# gundai now opens shop 2# added another team-cape shop to wilderness 3# Added shop lumb dungeon where you can buy barrow gloves 4# added heros guild shops 5# one more dupe fixed 6# loads of skilling bugs fixed 7# Pets 8# fixed the prices of barrows gloves
[LIST] [*]Perfect Combat [*]Pvp Fully complete [*]Pvn Fully complete [*]X-logging [*]Many Skills working [*]Many minigames [*]All Random Events [*]Pets [*]Treasure Trails [*]Skill Interfaces [*]Nostalgic Feel [*]- All working skills including agility you just need to figure out the system yourself. (really easy) - Mini-Quests, used these as a base before releasing quests which we never released. - Working mini-games, including barrows fixed. - 100s of clues fixed. - Almost 100% Slayer all NPCs added, just didn't add some reqs or tasks to certain slayer masters. - Fixed a memory leak - Fixed shops only loading to 165 - Fixed 2 dupes. - Many items fixed (couldn't wield or had no use) - Created a better yell system. - Fixed up all levers none worked before hand. - Fixed NPCs using wrong attacked (Melee, range and mage) - Updated skills, you can no longer dupe when runecrafting, fixed timers + interface options. - More to be listed I just forgot things I added. [/LIST] [/CODE]
PASSWORD: ahridok
MEDIA [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/j0kC7tv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9o2thqn.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3630587/13_PLAYERS.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/4EgO8.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/4Eix7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uiTWA.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/4Ejx6.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/4EjER.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/4EkcC.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=FBIR4I60qXM"] Let's Play Revival-RS | Episode 1 | - YouTube[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=MKwtwpzzaew"]Let's Play Revival-RS | Episode 2 | - YouTube[/URL]
[/CENTER]

item.title: Revival-RS 377 FULL REMAKE, NO BUGS, NO DUPES
item.dc:creator: @ranop11 ranop11
item.description:
@ranop11 wrote:

[CENTER]

I AM AHRIDOK FROM R-S, enjoy the source ( I DO NOT GIVE PREMS TO RELEASE ANY OTHER PLACE, ONLY I WILL DO THAT!)

DOWNLOAD:

http://www.upload.ee/files/3889581/Revival-RS.rar.html
CLIENT: (Use 2006memorys client)

Decided to release this, have no time to work on it anymore, so enjoy!

CREDITS: 2006Scape Team,2006Memory Team, Revival-RS Team

FEATURES/FIXED BUGS/ADDED

Also features music system can be enabled, client with secure UID can be enabled, and all dupes have been fixed on this version!
Global object one.

(There is so many more fixes/updates can’t remember alot of them :p)

[CODE]
1# Added Lesser Demon to the Wizard tower near Draynor
2# Added Canifis City NPC’s
3# Banana-harvesting (picking bananas from trees - Karamja)
4# Added mage bank shop (includes God capes, Staff’s)
5# Added Oziach’s Armour (includes rune platebody [YES FINALLY for you players], and green d’hide body)
6# All slayer shops have been fixed
7# Fixed too high price for green d’hides alch
8# Added Barker’s Haberdashery Shop
9# Mithril seeds has been added
10# Siegfried Erkle Shop has been added to Legends guild (2 floor correct location)
11# Few clue scrolls fixed
1# Fixed Kolodian shop (Not opening)
2# Added Monkeys to Karamja
3# Scavvo’s Rune Store has been added to Champions guild
4# Added Dragon SQ making from the left+right side’s
5# Added loads of new Clue NPC’s from help of “Mushroom”!
6# Stability and bug fixes
1# gundai now opens shop
2# added another team-cape shop to wilderness
3# Added shop lumb dungeon where you can buy barrow gloves
4# added heros guild shops
5# one more dupe fixed
6# loads of skilling bugs fixed
7# Pets
8# fixed the prices of barrows gloves

[LIST]
[]Perfect Combat
[]Pvp Fully complete
[]Pvn Fully complete
[]X-logging
[]Many Skills working
[]Many minigames
[]All Random Events
[]Pets
[]Treasure Trails
[]Skill Interfaces
[]Nostalgic Feel
[]- All working skills including agility you just need to figure out the system yourself. (really easy)

  • Mini-Quests, used these as a base before releasing quests which we never released.
  • Working mini-games, including barrows fixed.
  • 100s of clues fixed.
  • Almost 100% Slayer all NPCs added, just didn’t add some reqs or tasks to certain slayer masters.
  • Fixed a memory leak
  • Fixed shops only loading to 165
  • Fixed 2 dupes.
  • Many items fixed (couldn’t wield or had no use)
  • Created a better yell system.
  • Fixed up all levers none worked before hand.
  • Fixed NPCs using wrong attacked (Melee, range and mage)
  • Updated skills, you can no longer dupe when runecrafting, fixed timers + interface options.
  • More to be listed I just forgot things I added.
    [/LIST]
    [/CODE]

PASSWORD: ahridok

MEDIA









[URL=http://“http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=FBIR4I60qXM”]
Let’s Play Revival-RS | Episode 1 | - YouTube[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=MKwtwpzzaew”]Let’s Play Revival-RS | Episode 2 | - YouTube[/URL]

[/CENTER]

Read full topic
